name: Chris' Grilled Orange Chicken
author: CLHARTMAN
summary: This is a chicken recipe that my family absolutely loves. It is chicken breast marinated in lime juice, orange juice, lemon juice, mint, and honey.  It is very tender and the chicken is very moist.
ingredients: ¼ cup crushed fresh mint leaves
directions: Place the chicken into a large bowl, and pour in the lemon juice, lime juice and orange juice
Sprinkle the mint leaves over, and drizzle with honey
Preheat a grill for medium heat
When the grill is hot, lightly brush the grate with oil
Place the chicken onto the preheated grill, and discard the marinade
Cook for 6 to 8 minutes per side, or until no longer pink and juices run clear
